Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a grand slam off Detroit ace Tarik Skubal
The Guardians scored 7 runs while Skubal gave up 5 runs in the fifth inning
Emmanuel Clase struck out the final six batters in the eighth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Cleveland Guardians have won with timely hitting and a shutdown bullpen all season
The Guardians are an oddity among baseballâ€™s final four, with a $109 million payroll but considered the underdogs
The team has won 92 games under first-year manager Stephen Vogt
The Guardians had to take down Skubal, the front-runner for the AL Cy Young Award, to keep it going
Post-Match Reflections: The team celebrated with a unique postgame tradition of emptying champagne and beer bottles on each other
The team expressed determination to continue their success against the New York Yankees
Manager Stephen Vogt emphasized the team's approach of answering when they give up a run
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was part of the AL Division Series between the Cleveland Guardians and the Detroit Tigers
The Guardians were not expected to contend this season but won the tough AL Central
The game was the first ALCS visit for the Guardians since 2016
